sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		playerID as string,
		yearID as string,
		stint as string,
		teamID as string,
		lgID as string,
		G as string,
		AB as string,
		R as string,
		H as string,
		H2B as string,
		H3B as string,
		HR as string,
		RBI as string,
		SB as string,
		CS as string,
		BB as string,
		SO as string,
		IBB as string,
		HBP as string,
		SH as string,
		SF as string,
		GIDP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

transformations.name: Aggregate1
transformations.script:
source1 aggregate(groupBy(playerID_year= playerID + yearID),
	dummy = sum(1)) ~> Aggregate1
